title: [Chimesea's Magic Shoppe]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A badly scarred oak counter and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a midnight garden tapestry hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A badly scarred oak counter and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.
